channel.title: New people login please help [317]
channel.description:
guys someone tell me how to make it so when a player plays for the first time he gets to design his char
wL source -

item.title: New people login please help [317]
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

U didn’t understand his question. He wants the char design interface popping up when a registered player logs in for the first time.

Read full topic

item.title: New people login please help [317]
item.dc:creator: @monkey_money30 monkey money30
item.description:
@monkey_money30 wrote:

Go in client.java search (Ctrl+f or click edit then find/find next) starter,

Replace

[code]if(starter == 0){
starter = 1;

	    showInterface(3559);
	    apset = true;

tradeTimer = 1200;
addItem(995, 5000000);
addItem(556, 3000);
if (playerHasItem(1050,1))
deleteItem(1050,1);
}[/code]

Replace it with that, you can change

addItem(995, 5000000); addItem(556, 3000);
To what ever starter items you want.

I hope I helped, I think I might have made it a little hard to read, sorry…

Read full topic

item.title: New people login please help [317]
item.dc:creator: @sikeo sikeo
item.description:
@sikeo wrote:

[quote=“Phineas, post:2, topic:330665”]Add the character command if it is not already there. It should be in the wL source.

if (command.startsWith("char")) { showInterface(3559); } btw im gay [/quote]

no i want it to do it automatically

Read full topic

item.title: New people login please help [317]

item.description:
@Phineas wrote:

Add the character command if it is not already there. It should be in the wL source.

if (command.startsWith("char")) { showInterface(3559); }
